survey_name: Remote Learning Experience for Higher Education Students Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness, challenges, and overall satisfaction of remote learning experiences among higher education students.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your remote learning experience overall?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better data granularity. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for radio buttons.

answer_options: Technical issues (e.g., internet connectivity, software problems)
Limited access to academic resources (e.g., library, labs)
